titleStmt.title: A short compendium of the new and much enlarged sea-book, or, Pilots sea-mirror: containing the distances and thwart courses of the eastern, northern, and western navigation. Newly enlarged and amended, by several experienced navigators. / And now for the benefit and encouragement of our sea-men translated into English: and calculated according to 20 leagues for a degree by L. Childe Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Childe, L.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid for G. Hurlock ... and W. Fisher ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation and adaptation of parts of the Dutch Seespiegel and De lichtende columne.
Reproduction of original in the Boston Public Library.
